title: The Moon and the Cap
allTitles: {"bo":"ཟླ་དཀར་དང་ཞྭ་མོ།།","en":"The Moon and the Cap","fr":"La lune et la casquette"}
credits:
Originally published by Pratham Books,  a not-for-profit organization that publishes quality books for children in multiple Indian languages. 
Their mission is to "see a book in every child's hand" and democratize the joy of reading.
